title: Timely pitching helps Tech baseball to opening-day win over Oral Roberts - Tennessee Tech
content: Timely pitching helps Tech baseball to opening-day win over Oral Roberts  Tennessee Tech
description: MOBILE, Ala. â€“ The Tennessee Tech baseball team kicked off both the 2022 campaign and the return of head coach Matt Bragga to the helm of the program in style Friday afternoon, picking up a 5-2 victory over Oral Roberts at the South Alabama Invitational in Mobile, Ala.
